bibl.title: Divine Intervention: Invocations of Deities in Personal Correspondence from Graeco-Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Appeals to local gods: Soknebtunis; - Zeus Kasios. - 3. Supplications before major deities: Isis; - Tyche; - Sarapis. - 4. Indications of religious affiliation and self-identification in appeals to localized gods. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Mallory Matsumoto, Divine Intervention: Invocations of Deities in Personal Correspondence from Graeco-Roman Egypt.

1. Introduction. - 2. Appeals to local gods: Soknebtunis; - Zeus Kasios. - 3. Supplications before major deities: Isis; - Tyche; - Sarapis. - 4. Indications of religious affiliation and self-identification in appeals to localized gods. - Avec résumé en anglais.
